Song Title: Powerhouse
Movie: Coolie

Lyrics: Arivu

snippet.title: It's a Wrap on Kantara A Legend Chapter-1 | Hombale Films | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Loknath
snippet.description:
ğŸ”Š Available in multiple audio formats
ğŸŒ Watch in Kannada, Hindi, English, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam

From the soil of our land to the screens of the world â€” that was always the dream.
3 years of relentless dedication, 250 days of shooting, driven by faith and hard work.
The shooting of Kantara Chapter 1 wraps today.
The journey doesn't end here... itâ€™s only just beginning.
India's Divine Epic Releasing worldwide on October 2nd.

Movie Credits-
Studio : Hombale Films 
Produced by : Vijay kiragandur

mi.description:
ğŸ”Š Kei te waatea i roto i nga momo ororongo maha
 ğŸŒ Matakitaki i te reo Kannada, Hindi, Ingarihi, Telugu, Tamil me Malayalam

 Mai i te oneone o to tatou whenua ki nga mata o te ao â€” koira tonu te moemoea.
 3 tau o te haamo'araa tuutuu ore, 250 mahana pupuhiraa, na roto i te faaroo e te ohipa puai.
 Ko te pupuhi o Kantara Upoko 1 ka takai i tenei ra.
 Kare e mutu te haerenga i konei... katahi ano ka timata.

Dalla terra della nostra patria agli schermi del mondo â€” questo Ã¨ sempre stato il sogno.  
3 anni di dedizione instancabile, 250 giorni di riprese, guidati dalla fede e dal duro lavoro.

From the soil of our land to the screens of the world â€” that was always the dream.  
3 years of relentless dedication, 250 days of shooting, driven by faith and hard work.  
The shooting of Kantara Chapter 1 wraps today.  
The journey doesn't end here... itâ€™s only just beginning.  
India's Divine Epic Releasing worldwide on October 2nd.

id.title: Selesai dengan Kantara A Legend Chapter-1 | Hombale Films | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Loknath
id.description:
ğŸ”Š Tersedia dalam berbagai format audio  
ğŸŒ Tonton dalam Kannada, Hindi, Inggris, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam  

Dari tanah kami ke layar dunia â€” itu selalu menjadi impian.  
3 tahun dedikasi tanpa henti, 250 hari pengambilan gambar, didorong oleh iman dan kerja keras.  
Pengambilan gambar Kantara Chapter 1 selesai hari ini.  
Perjalanan tidak berakhir di sini... ini baru saja dimulai.  
Epik Ilahi India akan dirilis di seluruh dunia pada 2 Oktober.

nl.title: Het is een Wrap op Kantara A Legend Hoofdstuk-1 | Hombale Films | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Loknath
nl.description:
ğŸ”Š Beschikbaar in meerdere audioformaten  
ğŸŒ Kijk in Kannada, Hindi, Engels, Telugu, Tamil en Malayalam  

Van de grond van ons land naar de schermen van de wereld â€” dat was altijd de droom.  
3 jaar van onophoudelijke toewijding, 250 dagen van filmen, gedreven door geloof en hard werken.  
De opnames van Kantara Hoofdstuk 1 eindigen vandaag.  
De reis eindigt hier niet... het begint pas echt.  
India's Goddelijke Epische Film wereldwijd uit op 2 oktober.  

Filmcredits-  
Studio : Hombale Films  
Geproduceerd door : Vijay Kiragandur  
Geschreven en geregisseerd door : Rishab Shetty

om.title: Kantara irratti Marfama A Legend Boqonnaa-1 | Fiilmii Hombalee | Rishaab Sheettii | Ajaneesh Loknath
om.description:
ğŸ”Š Bifa sagalee hedduudhaan ni argama
 ğŸŒ Afaan Kannada, Hindi, English, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam tiin daawwadhaa

 Biyyee lafa keenyaa irraa kaasee hanga iskiriinii addunyaatti â€” yeroo hunda abjuun sun ture.
 Waggaa 3 of kennuu hin boqonne, guyyaa 250 dhukaasa, amantii fi hojii cimaan kan oofu.
 Dhukaasni Kantara Boqonnaa 1 har'a xumurama.
 Imalli asitti hin xumuramu... jalqaba qofa.
 India's Divine Epic Addunyaa guutuutti Onkoloolessa 2 gadhiifama.

 Madda Fiilmii-
 Studio : Fiilmii Hombalee
 Kan qopheesse : Vijay kiragandur
 Barreessaa fi Qajeelchituu : Rishab Shetty

eu.description:
ğŸ”Š Hainbat audio formatutan eskuragarri

 Gure lurraren lurzorutik munduko pantailetara â€” hori izan da beti ametsa.
 3 urteko dedikazio etengabea, 250 eguneko grabaketa, fedeak eta lan gogorrak bultzatuta.
 Kantara 1. kapituluaren errodajea gaur amaituko da.
 Bidaia ez da hemen amaitzen... hasi besterik ez da egin.

en-AU.title: It's a Wrap on Kantara A Legend Chapter-1 | Hombale Films | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Loknath
en-AU.description:
ğŸ”Š Available in multiple audio formats
ğŸŒ Watch in Kannada, Hindi, English, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam

From the soil of our land to the screens of the world â€” that was always the dream.
3 years of relentless dedication, 250 days of shooting, driven by faith and hard work.
The shooting of Kantara Chapter 1 wraps today.
The journey doesn't end here... itâ€™s only just beginning.
India's Divine Epic Releasing worldwide on October 2nd.

Movie Credits-
Studio : Hombale Films 
Produced by : Vijay kiragandur

Editor : Suresh

xh.description:
ğŸ”Š Ifumaneka kwiifomathi zomsindo ezininzi
 ğŸŒ Bukela ngesiKannada, isiHindi, isiNgesi, isiTelugu, isiTamil kunye nesiMalayalam

 Ukusuka kumhlaba wethu ukuya kwizikrini zehlabathi-yayisoloko iliphupha elo.
 Iminyaka emi-3 yokuzinikela okungapheliyo, iintsuku ezingama-250 zokudubula, ziqhutywa lukholo nokusebenza nzima.
 Ukudutyulwa kweKantara Isahluko 1 esonga namhlanje.

3 years of relentless dedication, 250 days of shooting, driven by faith and hard work.  
The shooting of Kantara Chapter 1 wraps today.

India's Divine Epic releasing worldwide on October 2nd.

sw.title: Ni Mazungumzo kuhusu Kantara A Legend Chapter-1 | Filamu za Hombale | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh Lokna
sw.description:
ğŸ”Š Inapatikana katika miundo mingi ya sauti
 ğŸŒ Tazama katika Kikannada, Kihindi, Kiingereza, Kitelugu, Kitamil na Kimalayalam

 Kutoka kwenye udongo wa ardhi yetu hadi kwenye skrini za dunia - hiyo ilikuwa daima ndoto.
 Miaka 3 ya kujitolea bila kuchoka, siku 250 za risasi, zinazoendeshwa na imani na kazi ngumu.
 Risasi ya Kantara Sura ya 1 inakamilika leo.
 Safari haiishii hapa... ni mwanzo tu.
 Epic ya Kiungu ya India Inayotolewa ulimwenguni kote mnamo Oktoba 2.

uz.title: It's a Wrap on Kantara A Legend Chapter-1 | Hombale filmlari | Rishab Shetti | Ajaneesh Loknath
uz.description:
ğŸ”Š Bir nechta audio formatlarda mavjud
 ğŸŒ Kannada, hind, ingliz, telugu, tamil va malayalam tillarida tomosha qiling

 Yurtimiz tuprogâ€˜idan tortib dunyo ekranlarigacha â€“ bu har doim orzu edi.
 3 yillik tinimsiz fidoyilik, 250 kunlik otishma, iymon va mehnatsevarlik bilan.
 Kantara 1-bobining suratga olish jarayoni bugun yakunlanadi.
 Sayohat shu yerda tugamaydi... endigina boshlanmoqda.
 Hindistonning ilohiy dostoni 2-oktabr kuni butun dunyo bo'ylab chiqariladi.

 Kino kreditlari -
 Studiya: Hombale filmlari

 Muharrir: Suresh

ms.description:
ğŸ”Š Tersedia dalam pelbagai format audio  
ğŸŒ Tonton dalam Kannada, Hindi, Inggeris, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam  

Dari tanah kita ke skrin dunia â€” itulah selalu impiannya.  
3 tahun dedikasi tanpa henti, 250 hari penggambaran, didorong oleh iman dan kerja keras.  
Penggambaran Kantara Bab 1 selesai hari ini.  
Perjalanan tidak berakhir di sini... ia baru sahaja bermula.  
Epik Ilahi India akan ditayangkan di seluruh dunia pada 2 Oktober.

jv.description:
ğŸ”Š Kasedhiya ing macem-macem format audio
 ğŸŒ Tonton nganggo basa Kannada, Hindi, Inggris, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam

 Saka lemah ing tanah kita menyang layar donya - sing tansah ngimpi.
 3 taun pengabdian tanpa henti, 250 dina shooting, didorong kanthi iman lan kerja keras.
 Syuting Kantara Bab 1 dibungkus dina iki.

en-IE.description:
ğŸ”Š Available in multiple audio formats  
ğŸŒ Watch in Kannada, Hindi, English, Telugu, Tamil & Malayalam  

From the soil of our land to the screens of the world â€” that has always been the dream.  
3 years of relentless dedication, 250 days of shooting, driven by faith and hard work.  
The shooting of Kantara Chapter 1 wraps today.  
The journey doesn't end here... itâ€™s only just beginning.  
India's Divine Epic releasing worldwide on October 2nd.

tl.title: It's a Wrap on Kantara Isang Alamat Kabanata-1 | Mga Pelikulang Hombale | Rishab Shetty | Ajaneesh L
tl.description:
ğŸ”Š Magagamit sa maraming format ng audio
 ğŸŒ Manood sa Kannada, Hindi, English, Telugu, Tamil at Malayalam

 Mula sa lupa ng ating lupain hanggang sa mga screen ng mundo â€” iyon ang palaging pangarap.
 3 taon ng walang humpay na dedikasyon, 250 araw ng pagbaril, hinimok ng pananampalataya at pagsusumikap.
 Matatapos na ang shooting ng Kantara Chapter 1 ngayong araw.
 Hindi dito natatapos ang paglalakbay... nagsisimula pa lang.
 Ang Divine Epic Releasing ng India sa buong mundo noong ika-2 ng Oktubre.

Release Date: 18 July 2025

Synopsis:
Yash Raj Filmsâ€™ Saiyaara is an intense love story, that launches Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda as the next YRF hero and heroine respectively. 

Directed by Mohit Suri, a master of the romance genre, Saiyaara tells a pure-hearted love story of two youngsters Vaani and Krish. While Vaani writes, Krish sings and they both make music together. Though poles apart in their lives, beliefs and backgrounds, Vaani and Krish are perfect with each other and for each other. Will they understand that truth despite their age, their problems? 

They say flawed, imperfect people make for a perfect love storyâ€¦and Saiyaara is about celebrating that one love story that is so deep, so pure and so caring that it is absolutely unconditional.

Vaani and Krish will have to navigate life, their problems, their insecurities to hopefully realise that only love can be the answer to everything. Saiyaara is a film that celebrates every season of love through the eyes of Vaani & Krish and poses a simple questionâ€¦do you love someone so much that you would bet everything to keep that person in your life?

snippet.title: COLORFUL JUICE | 10 VARIETY of Healthy Juices | Summer Health Drink | Natural Refreshing Fresh Juice
snippet.description:
Today in our village, we prepared 10 colorful and healthy juices using fresh fruits and natural ingredients. These refreshing summer drinks help you stay cool and hydrated with no artificial flavors or colors added.

We made Orange Juice, Red Dragon Fruit Juice, White Dragon Fruit Juice, Mango Juice, Apple Juice, Pineapple Juice, Cucumber Lemonade, Mixed Flavoured Juice, Grape Juice, and Kiwi Juice. Each juice is filled with natural goodness, bright colors, and a unique taste.

V.S. Achuthanandan, former Chief Minister of Kerala
Achuthanandan served as Chief Minister of Kerala from 2006 to 2011. He had withdrawn from public life after suffering a minor stroke in 2019 and had since been living with his son in Thiruvananthapuram. His body was shifted from the AKG Centre for Research and Studies to his son's residence and will be lying in state at the Durbar Hall before his funeral cortege departs on Tuesday afternoon. 
Achuthanandan is remembered as a towering figure in Kerala's communist movement, known for his resilience, integrity, and commitment to the working class. He was also a prominent voice against corruption and environmental issues

snippet.title: Bhide-Madhavi à¤¨à¥‡ Enjoy à¤•à¤¿à¤¯à¤¾ Goa à¤•à¤¾ Special à¤–à¤¾à¤¨à¤¾ | Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah | Comedy Overdose
snippet.description:
Click here to subscribe to the Sony LIV Channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/sonyliv

Get ready for a delicious treat with your favorite Gokuldham Society members! In this special compilation, join Jethalal, Taarak Mehta, Bhide, and the entire gang as they celebrate their love for food with hilarious twists, fun banter, and mouthwatering moments.

Show Name - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
Star Cast - Dilip Joshi, Disha Vakani, Amit Bhatt
Produced By - Asit Kumar Modi, Neela Asit Modi

#taarakmehtakaooltahchashmah #à¤¤à¤¾à¤°à¤•à¤®à¥‡à¤¹à¤¤à¤¾à¤•à¤¾à¤‰à¤²à¥à¤Ÿà¤¾à¤šà¤¶à¥à¤®à¤¾ #sonyliv #comedy #comedy2025 #jethalal #jethalalcomedy #tmkoc #taarakmehtakaooltahchashmah 

About The Show:
----------------------------
Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah is a comedy show inspired by the famous humorous column 'Duniya Ne Undha Chashmah' written by the eminent Gujarati writer Mr. Tarak Mehta. This show revolves around the Gada Family which consists of uneducated businessmen Jethalal Champaklal Gada, Jethalalâ€™s Wife Daya & their naughty Son Tipendra Gada living in 'Gokuldham Co-operative Society' and covers topical issues which are socially relevant. In case of a problem and emergency, Jethalal Gada often rushes to Taarak Mehta to seek his help and guidance as he finds a philosopher in him. The residents of the housing society, help each other find solutions when they face common, real-life challenges and get involved in sticky situations.

Click here to watch episodes from TMKOC: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn5vww_8o5KvwSUVzj-acz0LGKl6EUjgj

About The Show:
----------------------------
Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah is a comedy show inspired by the famous humorous column 'Duniya Ne Undha Chashmah' written by the eminent Gujarati writer Mr. Tarak Mehta. This show revolves around the Gada Family which consists of uneducated businessmen Jethalal Champaklal Gada, Jethalalâ€™s Wife Daya & their naughty Son Tipendra Gada living in 'Gokuldham Co-operative Society' and covers topical issues which are socially relevant. In case of a problem and emergency, Jethalal Gada often rushes to Taarak Mehta to seek his help and guidance as he finds a philosopher in him. The residents of the housing society, help each other find solutions when they face common, real-life challenges and get involved in sticky situations.

snippet.title: Laadla (1994) Full Hindi Movie (4K) Sridevi & Anil Kapoor & Raveena | Farida Jalal | Bollywood Movie
snippet.description:
Laadla is a 1994 Indian Bollywood action drama film, directed by Raj Kanwar and produced by Nitin Manmohan. The film stars Anil Kapoor, Sridevi, and Raveena Tandon in pivotal roles. And Farida Jalal, Aruna Irani, Anupam Kher, Prem Chopra, Paresh Rawal, Mohnish Behl, Shakti Kapoor, Alok Nath, Arun Bakshi others in supportive role. It is known for its strong dialogues, emotional story and powerful performances.

The story revolves around Raju (Anil Kapoor), a hardworking and principled man who is hired by a ruthless and arrogant factory owner, Sheetal (Sridevi). Their personalities clash due to their different ideologies. Raju believes in honesty and humanity, while Sheetal believes in power and control. Their constant conflict leads to unexpected developments, including a dramatic marriage twist that changes their lives.

snippet.description:

Perfect track for people who love solid music and strong words.

snippet.title: Pawan Kalyan Speech | Hari Hara Veera Mallu Grand Press Meet | Nidhhi Agerwal | AM Rathnam
snippet.description:
Pawan Kalyan Speech at Hari Hara Veera Mallu Grand Press Meet on Mythri Movie Makers.

Hari Hara Veera Mallu is an Upcoming 2025 PAN India Movie Starring Pawan Kalyan, Nidhhi Agerwal and Others. A film by Jyothi Krisna. Produced by A Dayakar Rao under Mega Surya Production. Music by MM Keeravani. Presented by AM Rathnam.

In Cinemas Worldwide from July 24th, 2025.

NIZAM RELEASE BY MYTHRI DISTRIBUTORS LLP.

#HariHaraVeeraMalluGrandPressMeet #HariHaraVeeraMallu #PawanKalyan #NidhhiAgerwal #JyothiKrishna #AMRathnam #MMKeeravani #ADayakarRao #MegaSuryaProductions #MythriMovieMakers #LatestTeluguMovies2025 #MythriDistributorsLLP

snippet.title: GULZAAR CHHANIWALA - Main Parwati Teri ( Official Video ) | New Haryanvi Song 2025
snippet.description:
Gulzaar Productions

Presentation

Song  - Main Parwati Teri

snippet.title: Aarush Laila in ROAST MODE For 2 Hours |  @sadhikasehgal  | Aarush Laila Podcast | @aarushbhola17
snippet.description:
Aarush & Laila are BACKâ€”and this time, itâ€™s personal, hilarious, and completely unfiltered. From Delhi boysâ€™ raw banter to deep friendship talks, this episode with host Sadhika Sehgal is packed with madness, emotion, and chaos.

They kick off by revisiting the prank they pulled on Manmansh Judeja, and quickly spiral into everything from acting gay, talking about virginity, to emotional revelations like Aarush buying his first house and the bond he shares with his dad, who Laila calls â€œthe friend we never had.â€

Expect savage birthday pranks (yes, the fake bike gift happened), awkward confessions (who Laila would date if he were gay), and brutal honesty about relationships - including why Aarush hates Lailaâ€™s girlfriend and thinks he deserves better. Aarush even exposes how Laila shares his live location with her 24/7, calling it toxic love at its peak.

Youâ€™ll hear wild stories of Laila almost getting arrested, calling his married ex while drunk, and getting slapped more than once, while Aarush remains surprisingly untouched by trouble. From gym talk to their very different music tastes, approaching girls at the gym, and even their gym playlistsâ€”nothing is off-limits. We also get a peek into their spiritual sides, with stories about Vrindavan trips, Lord Krishna, and Hanuman bhakti.

They spill tea on fake influencers, industry rivalry, and their Samay Rainaâ€™s Indiaâ€™s Got Latent Show experience.

They end with future dreamsâ€”Netflix series auditions, acting goals, their love languages, and the most chaotic Manali trip everâ€”think fire extinguishers, scared friends, and hotel staff complaints.

From friendship after 30, trusting each other with their girlfriends, to Delhi food recommendations and relationship red flags, this episode is a full ride - messy, meaningful, and made for everyone whoâ€™s ever had a best friend they can fight and laugh with at the same time.

snippet.title: Romeo S3 - Full Movie | Palak Tiwari, Thakur Anoop Singh | Pen Movies | New Hindi Movie 2025
snippet.description:
Romeoâ€¯S3, directed by Guddu Dhanoa and produced by Penâ€¯Studios and Wildâ€¯Riverâ€¯Pictures, is an adrenaline-fueled Hindi action thriller set in the underworld of Goa.
Thakurâ€¯Anoopâ€¯Singh stars as DCP Sangramâ€¯Singhâ€¯Shekhawat, a fearless cop who goes undercover to dismantle a dangerous drug cartel while uncovering a sinister virus-linked conspiracy.
Opposing him is Palakâ€¯Tiwariâ€™s investigative journalist, Tanu, whose dogged pursuit of truth pulls her into Sangramâ€™s high-stakes mission.
Packed with explosive fight scenes, high-speed chases, and larger-than-life stunts, the film delivers classic masala action in a bold, cinematic.
While praised for its sheer energy and punchy performances, critics note the storyline sometimes leans on predictable tropes and formulaic twists.

snippet.title: AB de Villiers Returns After 4 Years | SA Champions Win Bowl-Out vs WI | WCL 2025 Highlights
snippet.description:
AB de Villiers made his long-awaited return to cricket after four years in a thrilling WCL clash at Edgbaston ğŸ In a rain-hit 11-over match, South Africa Champions tied with West Indies Champions after both teams posted 80 runs. Lendl Simmons (28) & Chadwick Walton (27*) led the Windies effort, while JP Duminyâ€™s late 25*(12) brought South Africa level. ğŸ’¥

The drama continued with a bowl-out decider ğŸ¯ SA Champions hit the stumps twice, while the Windies missed all four attempts as SA won the bowl-out 2â€“0 to clinch a thriller!

snippet.title: Survive 100 Days Trapped In A Private Jet, Keep It
snippet.description:
Spending that much time in a jet is crazy
10 people will win $10,000 thanks to DoorDash. Enter promo code JET on any grocery, convenience or retail to get $10 off your order AND to enter for a chance to win $10K: https://bit.ly/44GtE3z
#doordashpartner 

To help offset the carbon emissions from the jet, we planted thousands of trees and are working with the Arbor Day Foundation to support certified carbon removal projects that restore forests and remove COâ‚‚ from the atmosphere.

Due to airport security, Dashers delivered this and all subsequent orders to a MrBeast crew member who then brought items to the pilot.

With DashPass, enjoy $0 delivery fees and lower service fees on eligible orders. Terms apply.

it.description:
Passare tutto quanto tempo su un jet Ã¨ assurdo
10 persone vinceranno 10.000 $ grazie a DoorDash. Inserisci il codice promozionale JET su qualsiasi prodotto di alimentari, di prima necessitÃ  o di vendita al dettaglio per ottenere uno sconto di 10 dollari sul tuo ordine e per partecipare alla vincita di 10.000 dollari: https://bit.ly/44GtE3z
#DoorDashPartner

Per contribuire a compensare le emissioni di carbonio del jet, abbiamo piantato migliaia di alberi e stiamo collaborando con la Arbor Day Foundation per sostenere progetti certificati di rimozione del carbonio che ripristinano le foreste e rimuovono il COâ‚‚ dall'atmosfera.

A seguito della sicurezza aeroportuale, gli addetti alla consegna di DoorDash hanno consegnato tutti gli ordini a un membro dello staff di MrBeast, che ha poi portato gli articoli al pilota.

Con DashPass, puoi usufruire di spese di consegna pari a 0 dollari e di commissioni di servizio ridotte per gli ordini idonei. Si applicano le condizioni.

en.title: Survive 100 Days Trapped In A Private Jet, Keep It
en.description:
Spending that much time in a jet is crazy
10 people will win $10,000 thanks to DoorDash. Enter promo code JET on any grocery, convenience or retail to get $10 off your order AND to enter for a chance to win $10K: https://bit.ly/44GtE3z
#doordashpartner 

To help offset the carbon emissions from the jet, we planted thousands of trees and are working with the Arbor Day Foundation to support certified carbon removal projects that restore forests and remove COâ‚‚ from the atmosphere.

Due to airport security, Dashers delivered this and all subsequent orders to a MrBeast crew member who then brought items to the pilot.

With DashPass, enjoy $0 delivery fees and lower service fees on eligible orders. Terms apply.

snippet.description:

Song: Preet Re 
Music Composer: Rochak Kohli
Lyricist: Gurpreet Saini
Singers: Darshan Raval, Jonita Gandhi & Rochak Kohli 
Music Producer: Rochak Kohli & Sharan Rawat
Guitars & Plucks: Mohit Dogra
Flutes: Tejas Vinchurkar
Mixing & Mastering Engineer: Eric Pillai (Future Sound of Bombay) 
Music Supervisor: Azeem Dayani
Sr Associate Music Supervisor: Tanvi Asher
Jr Associate Music Supervisor: Vasundhara Misra 

Zee Studios, Dharma Productions & Cloud 9 Pictures present
A Dharma Productions Film
DHADAK 2
Starring: Siddhant Chaturvedi & Triptii Dimri
Directed by: Shazia Iqbal
Produced by: Karan Johar, Umesh Kumar Bansal, Adar Poonawalla, Apoorva Mehta, Meenu Aroraa, Somen Mishra & Pragati Deshmukh
Co-producer: Marijke deSouza
Adapted Story, Screenplay & Dialogues: Rahul Badwelkar & Shazia Iqbal

A Zee Studios Worldwide Release

Lyrics:
Jis Din Tujhko Dekhun Na
Saansein Bhi Le Sakun Na
Tere Sang Laagi Jo Preet Re
Jaagi Jaagi Ratiyaan
Kaise Kaatein Akhiyaan
Tere Sang Laagi Jo Preet Re
Mere Dil Ke Tu Rahiyo Nazdeek Re
To Jo Saath Ho Toh Sab Lage Theek Re
Baatein Dil Ki Hoti Hain Baareek Re
Saahilon Pe Kashti Hai
Jaan Yeh Tujhmein Basti Hai
Tere Sang Laagi Jo Preet Re
Sar Kaandhe Pe Rakhna Tu
Maan Le Mujhko Apna Tu
Tere Sang Laagi Jo Preet Re

Kabhi Chup Chup Hai Kabhi Shor Hai
Jab Chand Ko Dekhe Yeh Chakor Hai
Kabhi Chup Chup Hai Kabhi Shor Hai
Jab Chand Ko Dekhe Yeh Chakor Hai
Udta Girta Baadalon Mein Dil
Ise Bandhe Tu Hi Woh Ik Dor Hai
Dhadkanein Yeh Kehti Hain
Tu Hi Inme Rehti Hai
Tere Sang Laagi Jo Preet Re
Reshmi Se Dhaage Hain
Saansein Daude Bhaage Hain
Tere Sang Laagi Jo Preet Re

Tere Bin Taare Gin Gin
Raaton Se Huyi Hai Yaariyan
Aankhon Ne Khwaabon Mein
Ghadiyaan Kayi Guzaari
Dil Tha Mera
Khaali Khaali Sa Safa
Tere Naam Se Sajne Laga
Saanjh Tu Sawera Tu
Raahein Tu Basera Tu
Tere Sang Laagi Jo Preet Re
Jaagi Jaagi Ratiyaan
Kaise Kaatein Akhiyaan
Tere Sang Laagi Jo Preet Re

#SiddhantChaturvedi #TriptiiDimri #Dhadak2 #KaranJohar

snippet.title: Sabba : Village Flow (Official Video) | Latest Punjabi Songs 2025 | New Punjabi Songs 2025
snippet.description:
Straight from the heart of the pind, Sabba drops 'Village Flow', a desi anthem full of pride, passion, and pure Punjabi swag! This isnâ€™t just another track â€” itâ€™s a celebration of Sabbaâ€™s roots and rise.

Is vaar gall sirf beats di nahi â€“ ae taan Sabba Da Lanter ae, jisnu vekh ke poora pind hi nach paeya! ğŸ”¥

#punjabimusic #latestpunjabisong #sabbadalanter


Streaming Links :

Insta
https://www.instagram.com/reels/audio/1384408396005666

Spotify
https://open.spotify.com/album/7bySaar4oQhsod5QaZrjvV

Amazon Music
https://music.amazon.in/albums/B0FH27Y1LW

Apple Music

Gaana

JioSaavn
https://www.jiosaavn.com/album/village-flow/I1Asyr2DoOM_

YouTube Music
https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=SRscWBa1OSE&si=_DpMZ6EdS3CoD55a 


Credits :

Speed Records Presents
Song - Village Flow
Singer/Composer/Lyrics - Sabba
Music - JayB Singh
Direction/Concept?Screenplay : Sahil Sharma
Presentation : Meeru
Producer - Sarabjit Saroya
Dop : Pardeep Potter
Editor : HC Edittz
Prod. : Sahil Sharma Filmzz (Honey)
Costume : Rajat Manchanda
Reels Shoot : Jagjit Chak
Digital Managed By Scope Entertainment
Digital Promotions By Speed Records Digital
Reel Promotions By Scope Digital
Label - Speed Records

Lyrics :
Ni baitha mai trakki de mathe ch jhanda gaddke
Ni utte nahio aaya thalle kise de vi laggke
Oh hun mera changa aaya kehnde pair chhad gya
Ni jehde maade time ch gye si hath chhadke
Oh lanka nahio dhayi bhave bheti aa harek de
Ni mere saale kinne hi jo bahre pye aa hate de
Ni bahoteya de rang udd janda kude face to
Ni charno da dohta baitha gaddi vich vekhke
Ho vekhi mardanya eh rang kartar de
Oh aap mar jande jehde doojeya nu maarde
Ho bahn jihdi fadi hove neeli Chhatt wale ne
Ni kitho sutt hona a laler nehri taarke
Oh chhetti hath aunde nahio uchiya udariyaan
Ni reejh na pugaiye asi vair nale yaariyan
Oh vairi voori vekhke badak maar dyidi
Ni kudi jandi vekh kde whistlaan ni maariyan
Ni gabhru rakaane bebe bapu ji to baahre na
Na saade kolo vaade hone lagne ve laare na
Ni tere kolo main vi tere maa-pe charwaune na
Te mere kolo ranjhe wangu pashu jaane chaare na
Na dil to greeb bhave bhute na ameer ni
Aa jehde nal bhai kathi kri na mandeer ni
Ni susti na nede tede mitran de laggdi 
Ni 24 ghante lor vich rehnda ae sareer ni
Ni bhaiyan te yakeen security jeyo z te
Ho bade dil lutte akh mittraa di red ne
Ho dabb nal lgga jo rakaane 30 bore da
Flower bna dewe bhaida eh forehead te
Na nimm jehe lot aune mitthi teri talk to
Na pighluga dil eh jwaani teri hot to
Dass fer sher da ni rutba ki reh gya
Je oh vi gya pattya rakaane cat walk to
Oh zindgi nu reejha nal maande aa baithke
Koi chakkr ni meeru bai khada jado back te
Ho asi befikre 9 10 vje sojiye
Ni sathon gallan adhi raat honiya ni chat te
Ni chattya ni kde v yaara ne billo thukk ke
Oh jo vi kita shar-e-aam kreya ni lukk ke
Oh Kayi saale raula pake kehn asi ki aa
Te sara kujh dssya ae mittra di chupp ne
Jo tappde aa salya nu shittra di ghaat ni
Oh fer vekhi baith jaane sara chupp chaap ni
Ohh kehnde ne ke saade naalo vadda koi vaily ni
Te Dhaai saah ne ch*** de utte bhora maas ni
Neet saaf rabb ne vi kujh ni lakoya kude
Tension ni len koi dinda bai saroya kude
Dhannwaad karda va saareya da dil to
Haaye pauna si punjab kattha lentar te hoya kude
Ho dunia ta jitti baitha hun kithe haar da
Jhool jhool ture kude pota jagtar da
Oh jihna hun takk aukh vich hi aa kattli
Ni maapeya nu geda mai lwauna ik bahar da
Ho guru ghar jaake bhala sareyaa da mangda
Ho adhi cho vi adhi cheej doojeya na vand da
Ho mai ni kehnda rabb bahla deyi jawe menu
Jinna mera banda onna hi ohto mangda

à¤ªà¥à¤°à¥‡à¤®à¤¿à¤•à¤¾ à¤¬à¤¨à¤¨à¤¾ à¤†à¤¸à¤¾à¤¨ à¤¹à¥ˆ à¤ªà¤° à¤¬à¥€à¤µà¥€ à¤¬à¤¨à¤¾à¤¨à¤¾ à¤‰à¤¤à¤¨à¤¾ à¤¹à¥€ à¤®à¥à¤¶à¥à¤•à¤¿à¤² à¤¹à¥ˆ - Salman Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Sushmita Sen à¥›à¤¬à¤°à¤¦à¤¸à¥à¤¤ à¤¸à¥€à¤¨ - Biwi No.1 - Hindi à¥›à¤¬à¤°à¤¦à¤¸à¥à¤¤ à¤¸à¥€à¤¨

Get ready for a rollercoaster of emotions with Biwi No.1 (1999), a delightful comedy directed by David Dhawan. This film features an ensemble cast including Salman Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Sushmita Sen, Anil Kapoor, and Tabu, delivering a perfect blend of humor and drama.

The story revolves around Prem (Salman Khan), a wealthy man leading a blissful life with his wife Pooja (Karisma Kapoor) and their two children. Their idyllic existence is disrupted when Prem becomes infatuated with Rupali (Sushmita Sen), a glamorous model. As Prem's extramarital affair unfolds, Pooja discovers the betrayal and, with the help of her supportive family and friends, devises a plan to win back her husband and restore her family's happiness. The narrative explores themes of love, trust, and the importance of family bonds, all wrapped in a comedic package. 

Biwi No.1 was both a critical and commercial success, becoming the second highest-grossing Hindi film of 1999. The film received several accolades, with Sushmita Sen winning the Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of Rupali. The movie's soundtrack, composed by Anu Malik, also contributed to its widespread popularity. 

Experience the laughter, tears, and ultimate redemption in Biwi No.1 (1999)!

â—¾ Film :  Biwi No.1 (1999)
â—¾ Director: David Dhawan
â—¾ Writers: Kamal Haasan, Rumi Jaffery, Ikram Akhtar
â—¾ Producers: Vashu Bhagnani
â—¾ Cast: Salman Khan, Karisma Kapoor, Sushmita Sen, Anil Kapoor, Tabu
â—¾ Music: Anu Malik
â—¾ Genre: Comedy, Drama
â—¾ Language: Hindi

en.description:
â³ The wait is over!
Presenting Affair â€” the captivating new love song from the movie Maalik!

snippet.title: What Forced Jagdeep Dhankhar To 'Quit' As Vice President? | Crisis Brewing For BJP? | Akash Banerjee
snippet.description:
For the first time in the history of India - has a VP quit (forced to resign?) from office. Earlier a VP quit - only to contest a Presidential election ... but Dhankhar had 2 more years to his term.
Considered as a hardcore BJP loyalist, he allegedly went our of his way for the party - then what went wrong in the Jagdeep Dhankhar - Narendra Modi equation??? What will Dhankhar be remembered for and what does this drama speak about Indian politics?

***About Our Channel***

Van life is very common in western countries. So in this channel at E Bull Jet, we are featuring van life in India. This channel will showcase the real-life in India and nearby countries.

snippet.title: Inside India's BIGGEST Festival with 30 Lakh People! ğŸ¤¯ (Pandharpur Wari)
snippet.description:
Pandharpur Wari 2025 â€“ A Spiritual Journey with 30 Lakh Devotees

In this immersive documentary, we dive deep into the heart of the Pandharpur Wari. Here's what we explored:

ğŸ”¸ 30 Lakh+ People Walking for Days â€“ A sea of faith marching towards Pandharpur
ğŸ”¸ Lived Among the Warkaris â€“ Visited and documented how people live in tents during the yatra
ğŸ”¸ Witnessed the Sacred Ringan â€“ A divine ritual where a riderless horse representing the soul of a saint runs through the crowd, symbolizing devotion and energy
ğŸ”¸ Spoke to Warkaris â€“ Heartfelt conversations with devotees who walk hundreds of kilometres out of pure devotion
ğŸ”¸ Walked 10 km Everyday â€“ Experienced the physical and emotional journey ourselves
ğŸ”¸ Uncovered Mysterious Stories â€“ Legends, miracles, and untold tales of the Wari
ğŸ”¸ Revealed the Truth Behind the Name 'Vitthal' â€“ An exploration into the meaning, history, and significance of Vitthal Mauli
ğŸ”¸ Stories of Sant Tukaram & Sant Dnyaneshwar â€“ And many other saints whose teachings guide the Warkari tradition even today

This is more than a documentary â€“ itâ€™s a glimpse into the soul of Maharashtra.

ğŸ™ Jai Mauli!

snippet.title: Every Worker Needs to Know This! | ESIC | Dreamz Unlimited
snippet.description:
The Employeesâ€™ State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) is a government-run social security and health insurance scheme designed to protect Indian workers. Under the ESI Act, 1948, it provides financial and medical benefits to employees and their families in times of sickness, maternity, disability, or death due to employment injury.
This video explains how the scheme works and the key benefits you should know about.
âœ… Medical Benefits â€“ Free treatment for employees and their dependents
âœ… Sickness Benefit â€“ 70% of wages during certified medical leave
âœ… Maternity Benefit â€“ Paid leave for pregnant women
âœ… Disablement Benefit â€“ Financial aid in case of injury at work
âœ… Dependantsâ€™ Benefit â€“ Monthly pension for the family in case of death
âœ… Funeral Expenses â€“ One-time payment for funeral costs
âœ… Vocational Rehabilitation â€“ Support for disabled employees to regain employment
Whether you're an employee or employer, this is a must-watch to understand your rights and responsibilities under ESIC.

snippet.title: UK & Europe Trains Are Not What I Expected | Unscripted StandUp Comedy "Rant" by Rahul Dua | 2025
snippet.description:
Coming to 14 cities across UK & Europe in Sept'25 with my comedy special Allow Me! Tickets: https://linktr.ee/therahulduatour

Germany ka train system + UK ki train strike = Confused Indian traveler ka breakdown ğŸ˜…. 
In this unrehearsed, unscripted, straight-from-the-heart stand-up bit, I talk about my chaotic Europe tour in 2023 - from Berlin to Munich, Birmingham to London - and how desi expectations just don't match European transport â€œefficiencyâ€. ğŸ˜¤ I don't think I'd use "punctuality" and "German trains" in the same sentence again :P

No ACs in Europe, sweltering heat, trains that split mid-journey and UKâ€™s legendary train strike â€” everything that could go wrong, did.
If youâ€™ve ever traveled in Europe, struggled with Bahn systems, or faced sudden cancellations and delays â€” this oneâ€™s for you. Watch till the end for a real life example of "laut k buddhu ghar ko aaye". 

âœˆï¸ Have your own Europe travel disaster story? Drop it in the comments! Share it with your friends who are planning a Europe trip or don't stop talking about how good it was. 

Comment the city you have planned to visit and i'll share a tip or two about that city that no one else will. 

ğŸ‘‰ Donâ€™t forget to Like, Comment, Share & Subscribe for more travel rants and standup comedy! Next standup video coming in less than 2 weeks. 

#StandUpComedy #IndianInGermany #DesiTraveler #IndianComedianAbroad #TrainStrike #EuropeTravelFails  

Shot on 8th Sept 2023 in KÃ¶ln, Germany
Shot by: Yours Truly and Mehtab Singh, on tour

About the show: 
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah is a SAB Comedy Show inspired by the famous humorous column, Duniya Ne Undha Chashmah written by the eminent Gujarati writer, Mr. Tarak Mehta. This show revolves around the Gada family which consists of businessman, Jethalal Champaklal Gada, Jethalal's wife, Daya & their naughty son, Tipendra Gada living in Gokuldham Co-operative Society, and covers topical issues that are socially relevant. This hilarious show will surely tickle your funny bone.

Step into Jethalalâ€™s world with Gada Electronics!  Manage the shop, tackle quirky customers, and experience nonstop TMKOC-style fun.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPbh-P_C0BzRYOkpGxKL-6QmvYSL_ZuCu

We bring to you the best videos from your favorite show Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah. So, get your daily dose of laughter with Jethalal, Taarak Mehta, Daya, Champaklal and their neighbors in Gokuldham Society.

About Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah:
--------------------------------------------------------------------
The show is inspired from the famous humorous column 'Duniya Ne Undha Chasma' written by the eminent Gujarati writer Mr. Tarak Mehta. This story revolves around daily happenings in "Gokuldham Co-operative Society" and covers topical issues which are socially relevant. The show predominantly - revolves around 'Jethalal' who is an uneducated Gujarati businessman. Your 'Taarak Mehta', is his neighbor. 'Jethalal' finds a friend and philosopher in 'Taarak Mehta' and often goes to him for advice whenever he is in trouble. Jethalaal's family includes his simpleton wife 'Daya Ben' and a mischievous son 'Tapu'. Tapu is a menace and a constant source of trouble to all the members of Gokuldham. They have often warned 'Jethalal' to reform 'Tapu' or else be prepared to leave the premises. Lost hopes of being heard by his son push Jethalal' to call his father 'Champaklal' from the village. This was his great idea of leashing some control over the mischievous Tapu. The opposite happens and the grandfather joins hands with the grandson to make life a roller coaster troublesome ride for Jethalal.

Cast:
---------
Dilip Joshi as Jethalal Champaklal Gada
Disha Vakani as Daya Jethalal Gada
Nitish Bhaluni / Raj Anadkat / Bhavya Gandhi as Tipendra Jethalal Gada (Tapu) 
Amit Bhatt as Champaklal Jayantilal Gada
Sachin Shroff / Shailesh Lodha as Taarak Mehta
Sunayana Fozdar / Neha Mehta as Anjali Taarak Mehta
Tanuj Mahashabde as Krishnan Subramaniam Iyer
Munmun Dutta as Babita Krishnan Iyer
Mandar Chandwadkar as Aatmaram Tukaram Bhide
Sonalika Joshi as Madhvi Aatmaram Bhide
Jheel Mehta / Nidhi Bhanushali / Palak Sidhwani / Khushi Mali as Sonalika Aatmaram Bhide (Sonu) 
Gurucharan Singh/ Balwinder Suri as Roshan Singh Harjeet Singh Sodhi
Jennifer Mistry Bansiwal / Monaz Mevawalla as Roshan Kaur Roshan Singh Sodhi
Kavi Kumar Azad / Nirmal Soni as Dr. Hansraj Hathi 
Ambika Ranjankar as Komal Hansraj Hathi
Kush Shah / Dharmit Shah as Gulabkumar Hansraj Hathi (Goli)
Shyam Pathak as Popatlal Pandey
Sharad Sankla as Abdul
Azhar Shaikh as Pinku 
Ghanshyam Nayak / Kiran Bhatt as Nattu Kaka
Tanmay Vekaria as Bagha
Navina Wadekar / Monika Bhadoriya as Bawri

Produced By: Neela Asit Modi, Asit Kumarr Modi 
Special Thanks: Mahesh Vakil, Indu Tarak Mehta
Set Design: Jayant Deshmukh
On-Air Promotion  ( SAB): SAB OAP
Costume Designer: Alka Mehta
Costume Stylist: Ekta Brahmbhatt
Cameraman: Aamir Virani
Production Head: Arvind Marchande
Production Controler: Vinod Shishupal
Background Music: Sunil Patni
Online Editors: Vishal Tambe, Sandeep Singh 
Executive Producer: Jatin Yogesh Bajaj
Editor: Dinesh Gosavi, Kaushal Mistry, Devang Modi, Vinod Maurya
Creative Supervision: Krunal Khakhkhar
Operation Head: Sohil Ramani

Directors: Harshad Joshi, Malav Suresh Rajda

Television Adaptation and Designed By: Asit Kumarr Modi
